serverSide.entities

Class ConcentrationSiteClientProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • serverSide.entities.ConcentrationSiteClientProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MasterCloning, OrdinaryCloning, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConcentrationSiteClientProxy
extends java.lang.Thread
implements OrdinaryCloning, MasterCloning
    Service provider agent for access to the Barber Shop. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread
